labels.name: :crown: Type: Epic
labels.description: A Product that will advance or be a result of completing a milestone

labels.name: :rocket: Type: Feature
labels.description: A Deliverable that will advance or be a result of completing an Epic

labels.name: :man_technologist: Type: User Story
labels.description: A unit of work that will help advance a Feature

labels.name: :computer_mouse: Type: Task
labels.description: Small piece of work that breaks down a User Story further

labels.name: :one: Good First Issue
labels.description: Great for a developer just starting out on this project

labels.name: :floppy_disk: Area: Backend
labels.description: Relates to backend development e.g. API, Database etc

labels.name: :art: Area: Frontend
labels.description: Relates to frontend development e.g. Angular, React, XAML etc

labels.name: :robot: Area: DevOps
labels.description: Setting up of DevOps processes e.g. GitHub Actions, Azure DevOps Pipelines etc

labels.name: :electric_plug: Area: API
labels.description: Work related to configuring the API endpoint(s)

labels.name: :scroll: Area: Documentation
labels.description: Updating documentation (e.g. README, Wiki, Guides etc.)

labels.name: :octocat: Area: GitHub
labels.description: Work that pertains to improving the repo's use of GitHub's pre-existing offerings

labels.name: :pencil2: Area: Standardization
labels.description: Work that improves standardization across GitHub repos

labels.name: :recycle: QoL: Refactor
labels.description: A code quality improvement e.g. Tech debt
